医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
剖腹产儿单次麻疹疫苗注射无效的可能性高出 2.6 倍出生时和疫苗接种后麻疹免疫力的动态。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/Single-measles-jab-up-to-26-times-more-likely-to-be-inefficient-in-C-section-born-children。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/Single-measles-jab-up-to-26-times-more-likely-to-be-inefficient-in-C-section-born-children。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=108b659a-7711-4b10-97be-593aa1aa4e8c Wed, 15 May 2024 05:41:00 -0400 Single measles jab up to 2.6 times more likely to be ineffective in C-section born children
Enhanc3D Genomics 任命 Hazel Jones 为首席执行官Enhanc3D Genomics 是一家开发颠覆性技术来解锁 3D 基因组以用于新目标识别和独特患者分层的公司，今天宣布任命 Hazel Jones 为首席执行官，此前他成功担任了六个月的临时首席执行官和首席运营官。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/Enhanc3D-Genomics-appoints-Hazel-Jones-as-Chief-Executive-Officer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/Enhanc3D-Genomics-appoints-Hazel-Jones-as-Chief-Executive-Officer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f0e1d455-9df0-47e0-ab72-c5b46cb568ec Wed, 15 May 2024 05:10:00 -0400 Enhanc3D Genomics appoints Hazel Jones as Chief Executive Officer
使用 INTEGRA Biosciences 液体处理工具简化免疫传感和信号动力学研究免疫传感和信号动力学小组的免疫学家|葡萄牙波尔图 Instituto de Investigação e Inovação em Saúde (i3S) 的ImmunoHUB 正在使用 INTEGRA Biosciences 实验室工具来帮助我们进一步了解人体免疫系统。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/Streamlined-immune-sensing-and-signaling-dynamics-research-with-INTEGRA-Biosciences-liquid-handling-tools.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/Streamlined-immune-sensing-and-signaling-dynamics-research-with-INTEGRA-Biosciences-liquid-handling-tools.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=79ba1216-5e56-411d-8884-7dd9ae217acb Wed, 15 May 2024 03:18:00 -0400 Streamlining immune sensing and signaling dynamics research with INTEGRA Biosciences liquid handling tools
Optibrium 与 FMC Corporation 合作改变农用化学品的发现Optibrium 是药物发现软件和人工智能解决方案的领先开发商，已与全球农作物保护领域的领导者 FMC Corporation (FMC) 签署了其人工智能驱动的发现平台 Cerella™ 的许可协议。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/Optibrium-partners-with-FMC-Corporation-to-transform-agrochemical-discovery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/Optibrium-partners-with-FMC-Corporation-to-transform-agrochemical-discovery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2adb04af-3aba-40fc-ab95-19fee4e18573 Wed, 15 May 2024 03:17:00 -0400 Optibrium partners with FMC Corporation to transform agrochemical discovery
研究发现41%长期瘙痒的人有疲劳症状根据《英国皮肤病学杂志》发表的最新研究，41% 患有长期瘙痒的人会感到疲劳，这可能是由于持续的睡眠中断造成的。相比之下，对照组中只有 22% 的人感到疲劳。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/Study-finds-4125-of-people-with-long-term-itchiness-have-fatigue.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/Study-finds-4125-of-people-with-long-term-itchiness-have-fatigue.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5ec1d6c4-18c1-4f1a-9d95-3117824a4ddd Wed, 15 May 2024 03:02:00 -0400 Study finds 41% of people with long-term itchiness have fatigue
新研究确定了 17 个驱动衰老血细胞克隆造血的基因科学家们还发现了另外 17 个基因，随着年龄的增长，这些基因会导致突变血细胞异常过度生长。该研究结果今天（5 月 14 日）发表在《自然遗传学》杂志上，为克隆造血背后的遗传因素提供了更全面的视角，克隆造血是一个与衰老相关的过程，并与血癌风险增加有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/New-study-identizes-17-genes-driven-clonal-hematopoiesis-in-aging-blood-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/New-study-identizes-17-genes-driven-clonal-hematopoiesis-in-aging-blood-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a413991e-a866-452b-9fdd-60de50601cbf Wed, 15 May 2024 02:59:00 -0400 New study identifies 17 genes driving clonal hematopoiesis in aging blood cells
超过20,000名志愿者齐心协力加速痴呆症药物研发该资源已招募超过 20,000 名志愿者，旨在加快急需的痴呆症药物的开发。该队列将使大学和工业界的科学家能够让健康个体参与临床试验，以测试新药是否可以减缓包括记忆在内的各种大脑功能的下降并延缓痴呆症的发作。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/More-than-20000-volunteers-join-effort-to-accelerate-dementia-drug-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/More-than-20000-volunteers-join-effort-to-accelerate-dementia-drug-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=99c4fa47-bef4-425c-874e-49668402b389 Wed, 15 May 2024 02:57:00 -0400 More than 20,000 volunteers join effort to accelerate dementia drug development
NICE 推荐用于淋巴结阳性乳腺癌患者的 Oncotype DX 乳腺癌复发评分测试癌症筛查和诊断测试的领先提供商 Exact Sciences 今天宣布，英国国家健康与护理卓越研究所 (NICE) 建议扩大使用 Oncotype DX 乳腺癌复发评分®测试，以更有效地针对女性进行化疗激素受体阳性 (HR+)、人表皮生长因子受体 2 阴性 (HER2-)、涉及最多三个阳性淋巴结的早期乳腺癌以及已度过更年期的人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/Oncotype-DX-Breast-Recurrence-Score-test-recommended-by-NICE-for-lymph-node-positive-breast-cancer-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/Oncotype-DX-Breast-Recurrence-Score-test-recommended-by-NICE-for-lymph-node-positive-breast-cancer-病人.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b8eedd56-7c92-4fb5-a722-484890afebc2 Wed, 15 May 2024 02:53:00 -0400 Oncotype DX Breast Recurrence Score test recommended by NICE for lymph node-positive breast cancer patients
代谢组学研究发现预测新生儿自闭症的生物标志物《通讯生物学》的一项研究利用新生儿的代谢组学来识别可能预测自闭症谱系障碍 (ASD) 的标记物，发现自闭症儿童与正常发育儿童相比具有不同的代谢特征。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240514/Metabolomics-study-finds-biomarkers-predicting-autism-in-newborns.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240514/Metabolomics-study-finds-biomarkers-predicting-autism-in-newborns.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7fb46ed8-c980-4d1e-aa5e-c5652a4f04df Tue, 14 May 2024 23:59:00 -0400 Metabolomics study finds biomarkers predicting autism in newborns
研究表明睡眠和麻醉会阻碍大脑毒素的清除研究人员发现，在睡眠和麻醉期间，大脑清除率都会降低，这与这些状态增强毒素清除的观点相矛盾。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240514/Sleep-and-anesthesia-hinder-brain-toxin-clearance-study-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240514/Sleep-and-anesthesia-hinder-brain-toxin-clearance-study-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0d1dde17-a81e-498d-ac38-e7f85f0f590d Tue, 14 May 2024 23:22:00 -0400 Sleep and anesthesia hinder brain toxin clearance, study reveals
